name: Body Mastery
text: Meditation allows you to harden your body against physical attacks.
prerequisites: Wis 19, Body Control, Meditation Master, character level 15th.
benefit: For 24 hours after you meditate, you gain damage reduction 2/—.
text_zh: 冥想会加固你的身体来对抗物理攻击。
prerequisites_zh: 感知19，身体制御，冥想大师，角色等级15。
benefit_zh: 在你冥想后的24小时内，你获得伤害减免2/-。
